thread.title: Akshay Kumar pictured with daughter Nitara on family holiday in England! See pics
thread.title_full: Akshay Kumar pictured with daughter Nitara on family holiday in England! See pics

author: Rashmi Mishra
title: Akshay Kumar pictured with daughter Nitara on family holiday in England! See pics
text:
Akshay Kumar pictured with daughter Nitara on family holiday in England! See pics By Rashmi Mishra on October 24, 2015 at 12:04 PM Comments Bollywood actor Akshay Kumar basking in the glory of his last movie Singh is Bling ’s success has been holidaying with his family in England. The 48-year-old superstar who is currently shooting for director duo Sajid-Farhad’s upcoming comedy Housefull 3, ensured to spend quality time with his princess daughter Nitara as seen in the pictures shared on Twitter. These pictures of Khiladi Kumar and his adorable baby girl will melt your hearts. Wife Twinkle is also accompanying them. Also Read: Cute! Hrithik Roshan attends Akshay Kumar’s daughter Nitara’s Birthday Party Akshay Kumar who completely dots on his 3-year-old daughter Nitara and calls her ‘little princess’ shared a cute picture from their holiday diaries. The father-daughter duo are snapped in a picturesque photograph where the two are seen enjoying some cool sessions inside a pool while facing the beach. Also Read: Revealed!! Akshay Kumar and Twinkle Khanna’s daughter Nitaara’s first pictures Beach, great weather and my little princess by my side…just what the doctor ordered #goodtimes #beachbaby pic.twitter.com/MVGfysIWA0 
— Akshay Kumar (@akshaykumar) October 23, 2015 Akshay wrote, ““Beach, great weather and my little princess by my side…just what the doctor ordered #goodtimes #beachbaby,” describing this sweet picture. Earlier, star wife and famous columnist Twinkle Khanna shared a picture of Akshay and Nitara looking closely out of the window of plane with caption “And we are off #HolidayHoliday” on her micro-blogging account. Also Read: Akshay Kumar and daughter Nitara enjoy summers plucking mangoes! Wife Twinkle Khanna tweets irresistibly cute pic . 
— Twinkle Khanna (@mrsfunnybones) October 21, 2015 Twinkle Khanna who goes by the byname MrsFunnyBones on Twitter is a regular with giving glimpse about her life. She and Akshay married in 2001 and are also parents of 13-year-old Aarav. On the work front, Twinkle is busy with her brilliant blog while Akshay Kumar will be seen in Houseful 3 and Raja Krishna Menon’s Airlift, along with actress Nimrat Kaur. 
  12:08 PM Topics:
